items.title: Nissan and Honda consider merger to take on Toyota
items.description: A deal would effectively consolidate the Japanese auto industry into two main camps: One controlled by Honda, Nissan and Mitsubishi and another consisting of Toyota group companies

items.title: Shriram Finance seeks record $1.25 billion offshore loan split across currencies
items.description: The loan adds to this year’s rush of offshore debt sales by Indian shadow lenders after the nation’s central bank tightened rules in November 2023 that made it increasingly difficult for the sector to obtain local currency bank loans.

items.title: Why Aadhar Housing Finance is a sound long-term bet
items.description: Largest affordable housing finance player, yet undervalued.

items.title: Akzo Nobel India shares higher by 6% on report of $2-2.5 billion deal value for assets; Pidilite, JSW, Indigo in the fray
items.description: Shares of Akzo Nobel India, the maker of Dulux Paints, are witnessing strong buying interest as the race reportedly narrows down to three major players that are in the fray. Parent Akzo Nobel has hired Citigroup to conduct the India asset sale.
